messages.content:
I want you to help me with making my summary better, check it for grammar mistakes and such things 

don't change a lot in it and don't change my tone, just small improvements to make it more consistence and better

here is it


Passionate and driven Full-Stack Web Developer with around 4 years of experience in the tech industry. I began my journey as a Teaching Assistant for a front-end development bootcamp organized by Re:Coded. Since then, I have worked as a Full-Stack Developer at Bloom, collaborating with exceptional mentors and co-workers who have continuously helped me identify areas for growth. Through my dedication, I have successfully interviewed and hired developers, mentored interns and juniors, acted as an onboarding buddy for experienced professionals and even took some leading positions, where I am now is just my dreams few years ago, and my current dream is to stand on a stage and give a talk to an sundance of software engineers from all around the world to talk about some cutting edge new technology that I help bringing it to life.

Your summary is already quite strong, capturing your enthusiasm and professional journey effectively. Here are a few tweaks for improved clarity and consistency:

"Passionate and driven, I am a Full-Stack Web Developer with approximately 4 years of experience in the tech industry. My journey began as a Teaching Assistant at a front-end development bootcamp organized by Re:Coded. Since then, I have been working as a Full-Stack Developer at Bloom. In this role, I collaborate with exceptional mentors and co-workers who continuously help me identify areas for growth. My dedication has led me to successfully interview and hire developers, mentor interns and juniors, and act as an onboarding buddy for experienced professionals. I've even taken on some leadership positions. Where I am now was once just a dream, and my current aspiration is to stand on a stage, addressing a global audience of software engineers, and talk about cutting-edge technology that I helped bring to life."

This revision maintains your original tone while enhancing the flow and clarity of your narrative.
